001package org.relationlearn.test;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import org.relationlearn.util.TextUtils;
005
006/**
007 *
008 * @author Dídac
009 */
010public class TestLearning {
011    
012    private static final String TEST_TEXT = "Random alcohol tests are more effective than alternative measures. \""
013            + "The federal Justice Department of Canada moved to implement Random Breath Testing (RBT), \""
014            + "concluding: \"a system of random checks is more effective "
015            + "than a combination of other measures such as a lower "
016            + "threshold for blood alcohol level and more frequent RIDE checkpoints\"";
017    
018    public static void main(String args[]) {
019        System.out.println("ORIGINAL: " + TEST_TEXT);
020        System.out.println("PARSED: " + Arrays.toString(TextUtils.getWordsFromText(TEST_TEXT)));
021    }
022
023}
